DOC.brief_summary: The objective observational study investigate switch phytotherapy ALNA® least 4 week phytotherapy still present symptom sum score ≥ 8 point ( International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) )
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Patients With Functional Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia Symptoms Who Switched From Phytotherapy ALNA® ( Tamsulosin )
DOC.criteria: Patients suffer BPH symptom Preceding treatment phytotherapeutic least 4 week IPSS sum score ≥ 8 point prior treatment start ALNA® Indication switch treatment ALNA® minimum period 2 month Patients fulfil one general specific contraindication list ALNA® Summary Product Characteristic , particularly patient know hypersensitivity tamsulosin hydrochloride ingredient product , orthostatic dysregulation severe liver insufficiency Patients receive ALNA® within 4 week prior start present observational study
